$description: CCUI 3.0 light theme typography tokens. Uses Atkinson Hyperlegible Next for headings and Public Sans for body text.

body.$description: Body font stack for CCUI 3.0 theme. Public Sans is a neutral, open-source typeface optimized for UI and web.

heading.$description: Heading font stack for CCUI 3.0 theme. Atkinson Hyperlegible Next is designed for maximum legibility, especially for users with low vision.
